protocol_name: RNA Extraction from Cockroach Gut Microbiota
protocol_name_html: RNA Extraction from Cockroach Gut Microbiota

materials.reagent_name: EZNA MicroElute RNA Clean Up Kit

components.data:
Remove samples, cockroach gut lumen stored in 100μl RNALater, from -80°C and thaw on ice. Remove half of the sample for RNA extraction and then return the rest of the sample to the -80°C. Preheat thermomixer to 30°C. Prepare stocks and other materials, if necessary:

 

• GTC Lysis Buffer (from HP Total RNA Kit): Add 20μl B-mercapoethanol per 1mL of GTC Lysis Buffer. Can store up to 2 weeks at room temperature.

• RNase-free Lysozyme: 30 mg lysozyme per 1 mL of TE buffer. Store aliquots at -20°C

• Add 25-40mg glass beads to new tubes

• QVL Lysis Buffer (from MicroElute RNA Clean Up Kit): Add 20μl B-mercapoethanol per 1mL of QVL Lysis Buffer. Can store up to 1 week at room temperature.

 

Warning: Using the full gut lumen sample is too much--it will not purify.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Remove samples, cockroach gut lumen stored in 100μl RNALater, from -80°C and thaw on ice. Remove half of the sample for RNA extraction and then return the rest of the sample to the -80°C. Preheat thermomixer to 30°C. Prepare stocks and other materials, if necessary:

 

• GTC Lysis Buffer (from HP Total RNA Kit): Add 20μl B-mercapoethanol per 1mL of GTC Lysis Buffer. Can store up to 2 weeks at room temperature.

• RNase-free Lysozyme: 30 mg lysozyme per 1 mL of TE buffer. Store aliquots at -20°C

• Add 25-40mg glass beads to new tubes

• QVL Lysis Buffer (from MicroElute RNA Clean Up Kit): Add 20μl B-mercapoethanol per 1mL of QVL Lysis Buffer. Can store up to 1 week at room temperature.

 

Warning: Using the full gut lumen sample is too much--it will not purify.

components.data: Add 200μl PBS to each sample. Centrifuge at 5,000 x rcf for 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 200μl PBS to each sample. Centrifuge at 5,000 x rcf for 5 minutes.

components.data:
Remove and discard supernatant. Resuspend cockroach samples in 50μl lysozyme/TE buffer. Add 4μl Superase-In RNase inhibitor to each sample and vortex for 30s before incubating at 30°C for 10 minutes at 300rpm.

 

Warning: Using less Superase-In RNase inhibitor will result in degradation.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Remove and discard supernatant. Resuspend cockroach samples in 50μl lysozyme/TE buffer. Add 4μl Superase-In RNase inhibitor to each sample and vortex for 30s before incubating at 30°C for 10 minutes at 300rpm.

 

Warning: Using less Superase-In RNase inhibitor will result in degradation.

components.data: Add 700μl GTC Lysis Buffer to each incubated tube. Mix by pipetting. Transfer mixture to a new tube with beads and vortex for 30 seconds, then place on ice for 30 seconds. Repeat 3 times (so bead beating occurs for a total of 2 minutes). Centrifuge on short. Continue with HP Total RNA kit protocol (December 2010 Version), starting at step 5:
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 700μl GTC Lysis Buffer to each incubated tube. Mix by pipetting. Transfer mixture to a new tube with beads and vortex for 30 seconds, then place on ice for 30 seconds. Repeat 3 times (so bead beating occurs for a total of 2 minutes). Centrifuge on short. Continue with HP Total RNA kit protocol (December 2010 Version), starting at step 5:

components.data: Transfer lysate to a DNA clearance column placed in a collection tube. Centrifuge at 13,000 x rcf for 1 minute. Discard the DNA clearance column and save the flow through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer lysate to a DNA clearance column placed in a collection tube. Centrifuge at 13,000 x rcf for 1 minute. Discard the DNA clearance column and save the flow through.

components.data: Add an equal volume (700μl) of 70% ethanol to the lysate and mix by pipetting. Do not centrifuge.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add an equal volume (700μl) of 70% ethanol to the lysate and mix by pipetting. Do not centrifuge.

components.data:
Apply the sample to a HiBind RNA column inserted into a collection tube. Centrifuge at 10, 000 x rcf for 60 seconds at room temperature. Discard flow-through and reuse the collection tube in the next step. Place DEPC water in 70°C hybridization oven. Preheat thermomixer to 37°C.

 

Note: Maximum capacity of the HiBind RNA spin column is 700 μL, so you will need to repeat this step twice (adding half of the volume to the RNA spin column each time).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Apply the sample to a HiBind RNA column inserted into a collection tube. Centrifuge at 10, 000 x rcf for 60 seconds at room temperature. Discard flow-through and reuse the collection tube in the next step. Place DEPC water in 70°C hybridization oven. Preheat thermomixer to 37°C.

 

Note: Maximum capacity of the HiBind RNA spin column is 700 μL, so you will need to repeat this step twice (adding half of the volume to the RNA spin column each time).

components.data: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer I to the HiBind RNA column. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 60 seconds. Discard the flow-through and reuse the collection tube in the next step.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer I to the HiBind RNA column. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 60 seconds. Discard the flow-through and reuse the collection tube in the next step.

components.data: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer II by pipetting directly onto the HiBind column. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 60 seconds at room temperature. Discard flow-through and reuse the collection tube in the next step.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer II by pipetting directly onto the HiBind column. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 60 seconds at room temperature. Discard flow-through and reuse the collection tube in the next step.

components.data: Repeat step 9 for a second wash. Discard flow-through and place the HiBind RNA column in a new 2mL collection tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat step 9 for a second wash. Discard flow-through and place the HiBind RNA column in a new 2mL collection tube.

components.data: Centrifuge the HiBind RNA column for 2 minutes at maximum speed.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the HiBind RNA column for 2 minutes at maximum speed.

components.data: Transfer the column into a clean 1.5 mL centrifuge tube and add 50μl of DEPC water. Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes. Centrifuge for 2 minutes at maximum speed.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the column into a clean 1.5 mL centrifuge tube and add 50μl of DEPC water. Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes. Centrifuge for 2 minutes at maximum speed.

components.data: Follow Turbo DNA-free procedure for routine DNase treatment (Step 1 & 2): Add 0.1 volume 10X Turbo DNase Buffer (5μl) and 1μl TURBO DNase to the RNA and mix gently. Incubate at 37°C for 20-30 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Follow Turbo DNA-free procedure for routine DNase treatment (Step 1 & 2): Add 0.1 volume 10X Turbo DNase Buffer (5μl) and 1μl TURBO DNase to the RNA and mix gently. Incubate at 37°C for 20-30 minutes.

components.data: Add 350μl of QVL Lysis buffer and mix by vortexing. Add 250μl of 100% Ethanol and mix thoroughly by vortexing.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 350μl of QVL Lysis buffer and mix by vortexing. Add 250μl of 100% Ethanol and mix thoroughly by vortexing.

components.data: Apply sample to MicroElute LE RNA Mini Column inserted in a 2mL collection tube. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 15 seconds. Discard the flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply sample to MicroElute LE RNA Mini Column inserted in a 2mL collection tube. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 15 seconds. Discard the flow-through.

components.data: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer II. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 30 seconds. Discard the flow-through.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer II. Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for 30 seconds. Discard the flow-through.

components.data: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer II. Centrifuge at 13,000 x rcf for 2 minutes (to dry the membrane). Discard the flow-through and collection tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 500μl of RNA Wash Buffer II. Centrifuge at 13,000 x rcf for 2 minutes (to dry the membrane). Discard the flow-through and collection tube.

components.data: Transfer the column into a new collection tube. Open the cap of the column and centrifuge at maximum speed for 5 minutes. Discard the flow-through and collection tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the column into a new collection tube. Open the cap of the column and centrifuge at maximum speed for 5 minutes. Discard the flow-through and collection tube.

components.data: Transfer the column to a clean 1.5mL microfuge tube and pipette 30μL DEPC water into the column. Centrifuge for 1 minute at max speed to elute RNA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the column to a clean 1.5mL microfuge tube and pipette 30μL DEPC water into the column. Centrifuge for 1 minute at max speed to elute RNA.

components.data: Follow Omega Bio-Tek’s E.Z.N.A. MicroElute RNA Clean Up Kit (July 2014). Adjust the sample volume to 100μl (add 44μl of DEPC water).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Follow Omega Bio-Tek’s E.Z.N.A. MicroElute RNA Clean Up Kit (July 2014). Adjust the sample volume to 100μl (add 44μl of DEPC water).
